nav.div: Astoria School District » News » Coronavirus (Covid-19) Updates » Learning Resources

div.div:
Astoria School District is working to continue to serve the students of Astoria School District during Oregon's Extended School Closure. We are working to build both online and off line resources. The Distance Learning for All link below will take you to the website hosting information on instruction for students.
Distance Learning For All Hub
Below are documents on how Astoria School District is handling grading and work submission:
AHS 2020 Graduation Pathway Summary
AHS Grading and Grades 9-11
Grade 9-11 Submission of Work
Grade K-8 Submission of Work
This site is designed to be a comprehensive site for all buildings and grades. This hosts various online resources available for many different subjects.
Educational Resources K-12
Astoria School District | 785 Alameda Avenue, Astoria, OR 97103 | Phone 503 325 6441 | Fax 503 325 6524
